thread.title: Oscars 2017: Damien Chazelle wins Best Director for La La Land : Hollywood, News - India Today
thread.title_full: Oscars 2017: Damien Chazelle wins Best Director for La La Land : Hollywood, News - India Today

title: Oscars 2017: Damien Chazelle wins Best Director for La La Land : Hollywood, News - India Today
text:
CATCH ALL LIVE UPDATES FROM OSCARS 2017 HERE 
Now after winning four awards in total, writer-director Damien Chazelle grabbed the fifth Oscar for the film by winning the Best Director award. 
Earlier in the evening, La La Land won awards for Best Original Score, Best Original Song, Best Production Design and Best Cinematography. 
Damien Chazelle's La La Land is the story of two individuals who want to make it big in show business in Los Angeles. They slowly fall in love and eventually drift apart for the sake of their careers. 
La La Land, a bittersweet romantic musical, has been applauded for resurrecting the musical genre in Hollywood after decades. Chazelle's earlier film Whiplash won three Academy Awards in 2015.
